text: Calothyrza sehestedti is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Johan Christian Fabricius in 1798. It is known from Sri Lanka and India.BioLib.cz - Calothyrza sehestedti. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1798
title: Calothyrza sehestedti
